doc.name: any
doc.summary: Designates a randomly chosen member of a set.

examples.example: put any word of field "Dictionary" into wordOfTheDay
go to any card -- goes to a random card in the stack

description.p: Use the any keyword to specify a random object of a specified type, or to designate a random chunk in a chunk expression.
The any keyword does not examine every member of a set; it specifies just one member of the set, randomly chosen. For example, the expression

p.code: if myString is in any field

description.p: checks whether myString is in a randomly chosen field, not whether myString is somewhere in one of the fields on the card.
